# Government Tender Announcement
## Project Details

### Project Title
Layout of Non-Assigned Workstations - 7th Floor Québec

### Reference Number
PW-22-01016645

### Solicitation Number
5000068727

### Amendment Number
1

## Notice Details

### Notice Type
Request for Proposal

### Procurement Method
Competitive - Selective Tendering

### Procurement Category
Goods and Services (GD)

## Contract and Tender Information

### Expected Contract Start Date
None

### Expected Contract End Date
None

### Tender Closing Date
Wednesday, December 22, 2021 at 2:00 PM Eastern Standard Time

## Language
The tender documentation is available in both official languages (English and French).

## Location
Quebec (except National Capital Region)

## Size and Scope of Work
This announcement is related to the layout of non-assigned workstations in the 7th floor of a Quebec government building. 

## Relevant Code and Classification Information
GSSIP2/NIBS: *N7110C - CHAIR (OFFICE)

## Contract Regulations and Trade Agreements
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Points of Contact
* Carolyne Chenier
* Email: [carolyne.chenier@ec.gc.ca](mailto:carolyne.chenier@ec.gc.ca)

## Attachments
Tender documentation is available at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca)

Note:
The tender closing date has passed, and this solicitation is no longer active.
Please refer to [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca) for active solicitations.  Service Canada and its partners are committed to providing services in both official languages to reflect the diverse needs of Canadians, demonstrating our commitment to true bilingualism.
